name: Temple of Time HD
description:
20 years ago the temple of time made its debut, today its been re-created with all original assets in high definition. This is a detailed recreation of the Temple of Time, not only showing how far real time graphics have come, but also paying respect to one of the all time greats.
I tried to stay as true to the original as possible, including the individual assets, lighting, design, and atmosphere.

Please understand this is fan artwork and nothing more...

Created by Christopher Sweetwood
